Title:
A new species of Dacrymyces (Dacrymycetaceae) from
southwestern China
Abstract:
Dacrymyces sinostenosporus sp. nov. is described from
southwestern China based on morphological and molecular data. It is
characterized by sessile, gelatinous, pulvinate to discoid, applanate
basidiomata, the absence of clamp connections, and 0Â–7-septate
basidiospores. Combined phylogenetic analysis with ITS + nLSU sequence
also confirmed its novelty.
